articles.author: Geoff Bennett, Dan Sagalyn
articles.title: 'Havana syndrome' investigator on accusing Russia of targeting U.S. officials - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: For the last decade, American diplomatic, law enforcement and intelligence personnel have suffered grievous injuries in the line of duty. Many say they felt attacked by debilitating waves of sound and pressure known as "Havana syndrome." Sunday, 60 Minutes re…
articles.content:
Geoff Bennett:
For the last decade, American diplomatic law enforcement and intelligence personnel have suffered grievous, often life-altering injuries in the line of duty.
No guns or bombs or rock… [+1482 chars]
